column4: is there any third party package installer app for edgy? i m new linux user.  can someone help me thanks.
third party?  are you looking for something synaptic/apt do not have?
i have synaptic .. but want to ask is there another one like synaptic? well Apt not working on my pc..
that's deadly.  let's fix apt
apt is almost the basis of your system...dangerous if it doesn;'t work
i tried to install Apt. but when i select it for install its gave me error in return
not synaptic but it's apt.  adept is kde's front-end
apt is already installed.  what's wrong with it?
There is no Apt kinda name anything in system Admistration ? where i can found Apt?
apt is a system  componenet.  what are you trying to do?
looking for softwares installer like Synaptic
lol Adept is the synaptic for kde
hahh well i m using Gnome :S
ahaha
what??? synaptic then :P
well dude how can i add some third party repos.. in source file?
ya sorry get it.. what u are saying :)
well Automatix is suitable for Edgy? can i use it?
no it's a bad idea
just add some 3rd party repos that you need and  manually apt-get
